resources.string:
Welcome to Cusack, your Now Playing companion.

This app is currently in beta. There are many enhancements to come: Tour dates, customizable settings, etc.

In the meantime, you can help by giving some feedback and also by sharing the app with your friends.

If you are attempting to use Spotify, you MUST go to Spotify -> Settings and enable "Device Broadcast Status."

Made possible thanks to MusicBrainz, LastFM, Wikipedia, and Twitter.
In order to use Spotify, you\'ll have to enable "Device Broadcast Status" in Spotify\'s Settings.
Get to know your music with Cusack, only on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mattfeury.cusack
